title: SLFP too decides against accepting positions in new Govt.
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) has arrived at a decision not to accept any positions or be party to the government formed under Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, former President and SLFP Chairman Maithripala Sirisena said today.
He announced this to the media after the SLFP Central Committee meeting this morning.(Ajith Siriwardana)
